sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, some of Lord Walder's descendants name their offspring Walder or Walda to incur Lord Walder's favor - a custom the Lord of the Crossing finds annoying. There's no mention of a daughter of Lord Walder named "Waldra" (apparently a variant of "Walda"), nor of any of his granddaughters or great-granddaughters having the name "Waldra".
sections.Biography:
===Background===
Waldra is one of the many daughters of [[Walder Frey]], the [[Lord of the Crossing]].
===[[Season 3]]===
Along with several of Lord Frey's other daughters and granddaughters, [[Robb Stark]] had the option of marrying her. When he arrives at [[the Twins]] for his uncle [[Edmure Tully|Edmure]]'sÂ [[Red Wedding|wedding]], Robb apologizesÂ for his slight against them.<ref>"[[The Rains of Castamere (episode)|The Rains of Castamere]]"</ref>
